attributes.action: I wish the rule of Democracy to be upheld within this country with no revote
attributes.additional_details: I'm sure that everybody is aware of the recent EU vote and the outcome of said vote. The process used has been in place for more years than I am aware of and have served this country well. Never before have we had such a ludicrous position where the losing side have tried to force a second vote because they didn't like the outcome.  We are a democracy and in a democracy the majority rules. It is that simple and any question of over turning that decision is undemocratic in the extreme
attributes.background: I am very proud of this country and the action by disgruntled voters on a losing side, requesting a 2nd referendum are causing a divide that is unnecessary and damaging
